verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Come magnify the Lord with me
Come magnify the Lord with me
Come magnify the Lord with me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse 1:
I sought the Lord, He answered me
Delivered me from all my fears
Those who look to Him are radiant
And their faces will never be ashamed

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse 2:
Taste and see, the Lord is good
Blessed is he who hides in Him
Fear the Lord all His people
Those who fear Him have everything they need

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
Together, let us exalt His name
Together, let us exalt His name
